articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks Set to Extend Rally as US Shares Slip: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities climbed to a record and the dollar declined ahead of Wednesday’s US jobs report after weak retail sales reinforced bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year.
articles.content: Asian equities climbed to a record and the dollar declined ahead of Wednesdays US jobs report after weak retail sales reinforced bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year.… [+324 chars]
